author: Jeff Palon
comment: How about tweaking this app so watch mic can be used for phone call.that way I can keep phone in pocket

author: Huy Pham
comment: After I start and quit the app, my phone won't play music
title: It works but...

author: Alex Merrick
comment: Why is the quality so low?
title: Good start

author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: Nice little app. But I think the volume is to low of the sound coming out of my phone (galaxy s4). Think it could do with going up a bit. As it's to low to make the app useful. Plus if the app is left running in the background it lowers the volume of other apps.
title: Low volume

author: Raliek Allah
comment: Great start! When watches like the Moto 360 get speakers (hopefully in the next iteration) you will have absolute must have app.
title: Great start!

author: Justin Sano
comment: A cool way to use your smartwatch! I loved the way where it doesn't keep catching the sound that's not important.
title: Wassup

author: Drăcea Catalin
comment: Tried syncing over and over,reinstalling,restarting. Moto 360 FYI
title: Doesn't install

author: Enrique Robbins
comment: There should be a way for you to turn on the speaker from the watch

reply.author: Jacoh
reply.content: Great idea! We'll take a look and see if we can incorporate!

title: Cool but

author: Jean El Khoury
comment: First of all when it is installed the phone acts like it's in a call, it can't play music and can't record videos. Second of all the delay is sometimes good and sometimes it have like 5 seconds of delay. Nice concept but it needs improvements.
title: It needs many improvements

author: Brent Nowobilski
comment: Very low volume even when phone is maxed. Worse part is you have to activate speaker on phone each time you open from watch. Kinda defeats the purpose for me.
